touristgis.maps

Class TouristMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • touristgis.maps.TouristMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Map

    public class TouristMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements Map
    Implementation of the Map interface, for modeling tourist maps.

    • Method Detail

      • setPlacesLoader

        public void setPlacesLoader(PlaceLoader arg)
        Method for setting the PlaceLoader of the map. The PlaceLoader will be used for populating the map with points. The map is populated upon setting this property.
        Parameters:
        arg - an object implementing the PlaceLoader interface.

      • setPlacesRepository

        public void setPlacesRepository(PlaceRepository arg)
        Method for setting the PlaceRepository of the map.
        Parameters:
        arg - an object implementing the PlaceRepository interface.

      • setDirectionsRoutingCalculator

        public void setDirectionsRoutingCalculator(RoutingCalculator arg)
        Method for setting the RoutingCalculator of the map. This will be used by the TouristMap to compute routes between points.
        Parameters:
        arg - an object implementing the RoutingCalculator interface.

      • setDirectionsClosestPlaceCalculator

        public void setDirectionsClosestPlaceCalculator(ClosestPlaceCalculator arg)
        Method for setting the ClosestPlaceCalculator of the map. This will be used by the TouristMap to compute the closest facility to a point.
        Parameters:
        arg - an object implementing the ClosestPlaceCalculator interface.

      • getMapGUI

        public javax.swing.JComponent getMapGUI()
        Description copied from interface: Map
        Allows the caller to get the GUI of the map as a JComponent. This separates the map operations logic from the calling view.
        Specified by:
        getMapGUI in interface Map
        Returns:
        a JComponent containing the map view.
